titleNullable: Accident Damage Recoupment for City-Owned Property
subtitleNullable: Analyzing the Impact of Borough & Company Type
descriptionNullable:
_____
# Accident Damage Recoupment for City-Owned Property
### Analyzing the Impact of Borough & Company Type
By data.world's Admin [[source]](https://data.world/dataworldadmin)
_____

### About this dataset
> This dataset captures the details of Recoupment Requests for Damaged City-Owned Property as tracked by the New York City Department of Transportation's (DOT) Recoupment Unit. It includes information such as the location of the property, source and status of the recoupment request, latest action taken, borough associated with a request, name and contact information of responsible company, amount requested, and if an administrative fees was included. Get an up-close look at just how much damage these vehicle accidents cause on City-owned property in New York! Help us improve safety and wellbeing by exploring this dataset to help support better city policy decisions on damage prevention. Last updated at 2020-10-01 - Attribution is encouraged for use with New York City’s open data portal Terms of Use

### More Datasets
> For more datasets, click [here](https://www.kaggle.com/thedevastator/datasets).

### Featured Notebooks
> - 🚨 **Your notebook can be here!** 🚨! 

### How to use the dataset
> This dataset contains information about the recoupment of damages caused by vehicle accidents on City-owned property in New York City. It consists of eight fields, each with valuable data: 
> 
> - SourceDescription - this is the source of the recoupment request
> - Location - the location of the damaged City-owned property 
> - DateReceived -the date when this recoupment was requested 
> - CloseDate -the date when this recoupmant was closed  
> - Status -current status of the request  
> - LatestActionDescription - latest action taken by DOT's Recoupment Unit on this request  
> - Borough and Unit Description – borough in which damage occurred and unit responsible for handling it   
> CompanyName – name of company responsible for causing damage 
> RequestAmount– amount requested in the recoupmant；   			  HasAdminfee – whether an administrative fee was included or not.
> 

### Research Ideas
> - Using geographic data mapping, community organizations can analyze this dataset to identify “hot spots” of vehicle collisions in New York City and devise strategies to reduce risks to City-owned property. 
> - Employers could use this dataset to ensure that companies that partner with New York City are taking responsibility for damages incurred from vehicle accidents on their watch and paying appropriate expenses for repair or replacement of damaged assets. 
> - Academic institutions could mine and analyze the data in this dataset for research on the recoupment process and develop case studies related to administrative fees, request amounts, unit types responsible, etc., in order to better understand best practices for successful recoupment requests in the future

### Acknowledgements
> If you use this dataset in your research, please credit the original authors.
> [Data Source](https://data.world/dataworldadmin)
> 
>


### License
> 
> 
> See the dataset description for more information.

### Columns

**File: recoupment-for-damaged-city-owned-property-1.csv**
| Column name                 | Description                                                                 |
|:----------------------------|:----------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| **SourceDescription**       | The type of damage done to the city-owned property. (String)                |
| **Location**                | The location of the city-owned property that was damaged. (String)          |
| **DateReceived**            | The date the recoupment request was received. (Date)                        |
| **CloseDate**               | The date the recoupment request was closed. (Date)                          |
| **Status**                  | The status of the recoupment request. (String)                              |
| **LatestActionDescription** | The latest action taken on the recoupment request. (String)                 |
| **Borough**                 | The borough in which the city-owned property is located. (String)           |
| **UnitDescription**         | The unit responsible for handling the recoupment request. (String)          |
| **CompanyName**             | The company responsible for the damage. (String)                            |
| **RequestAmount**           | The amount requested for recoupment. (Number)                               |
| **HasAdminfee**             | Whether or not an administrative fee was included in the request. (Boolean) |

### Acknowledgements
> If you use this dataset in your research, please credit the original authors.
> If you use this dataset in your research, please credit [data.world's Admin](https://data.world/dataworldadmin).
